content.description:
Aeneas among the Carthaginians

1 “O fortunati, quorum iam moenia surgunt!”

Aeneas ait, et fastigia suspicit urbis.

Infert se saeptussaepio, saepire, saepsi, saeptus: enclose, surround nebula, mirabile dictu,

per medios, miscetque viris, neque cernitur ulli.
content.question: In line 3, mirabile is qualified by

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2

skill.text: 1.B: Describe how grammar contributes to the meaning and function of Latin words and phrases in context.
